title: Alteva Expands Leading Mobility Solution With Integrated SMS Service
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 12:54 PM   Alteva 
PHILADELPHIA, PA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/16/15 -- Alteva (NYSE MKT: ALTV), a premier provider of hosted Unified Communications , expanding its industry leading Mobility applications and bring your own device (BYOD) support, announces today that it now offers Alteva SMS (Short Message Service), their newest addition to their cloud based Unified Communications solution. 
Alteva's SMS service allows users to send and receive text messages from their office (fixed line) phone number via their PC, smartphone or tablet. Any messages received on their office phone number will be delivered to the Alteva SMS application on their PC, via web portal, or smart device. The smartphone and tablet application is a free download available through the users' app store. 
"SMS texting has become an integral part of today's business communication landscape and we wanted to incorporate it into our Unified Communications solution in a meaningful way," states William Birnie, Chief Marketing Officer at Alteva. 
For more information about Alteva, channel partner program or to discuss partnership opportunities email sales@alteva.com or call 877-258-3821. 
About Alteva Alteva (NYSE MKT: ALTV) is a premier provider of Hosted Unified Communications that significantly enhances business productivity and efficiency. Alteva's UC solution integrates and optimizes best-in-class cloud-based technologies and business applications to deliver a comprehensive voice, video and collaboration service for the office and mobile workforce. Alteva is committed to delivering meaningful value to our customers through a consistent, high quality and unified user experience across multiple devices, platforms and operating systems. These attributes have positioned Alteva as a leading hosted communications provider and the partner of choice for a growing number of business customers nationwide and internationally.
